# 1990 RTHK Top 10 Gold Songs Awards

The 1990 RTHK Top 10 Gold Songs Awards () was held in 1991 for the 1990 music season.
Top 10 song awards
The top 10 songs (十大中文金曲) of 1990 are as follows.
